name: Жанна Никонова

review:
Alexander, Kim and the team thank you for your appreciation. Special thanks for the meat compliment. We really care about its quality and taste. Because it's love. We are pleased to receive such feedback from you. Even more pleasant - to see you again. Take care of yourself and come back again. We are already open to Leo Tolstoy and look forward to seeing you at the barbecue, tokpokki, soju etc 💜🥬🥓

review: Anastasia, thank you for taking the time to evaluate us. Maybe Kim's team should know more about your impression? The rating you left excited us. Let me clarify what influenced your assessment? Did we make a mistake in the service? Opportunity to change your impression and provide excellent service - a reward for the restaurant team. Always motivated to hear the guest and become better. Please write us a detailed review or contact us in any way convenient for you.
